00036 #ifndef PAGE_SIZE
00038 #define PAGE_SIZE (getpagesize())
00039 #endif
00040 #ifndef PAGE_MASK
00042 #define PAGE_MASK ~(PAGE_SIZE-1)
00043 #endif
00044 #ifndef PAGE_TRUNC
00046 #define PAGE_TRUNC(ptr) (ptr&(PAGE_MASK))
00047 #endif
00048 #endif

00050 /*
00051  * Initialize the object to use memory-mapping to access the file.
00052  */
00053 DataSet::DataSet(const std::string& fileName_, const DataSetHeader& header_, void* handle, bool loadEntireDataSetHint_)
00054 {
00055         fileName = fileName_;
00056         header = header_;
00057 
00058         mappedData = 0;
00059         data = 0;
00060         isOpen = false;
00061 
00062 #ifdef _MSC_VER
00063         fileMapHandle = handle;
00064 #else
00065         fp = 0;
00066 #endif
00067         mapStart = 0;
00068         mapLen = 0;
00069         fileStream = 0;
00070         useMemoryMapping = true;
00071         loadEntireDataSetHint = loadEntireDataSetHint_;
00072 }
00073 
00074 /*
00075  * Initialize the object to use std::ifstream to access the file.
00076  */
00077 DataSet::DataSet(const std::string& fileName_, const affymetrix_calvin_io::DataSetHeader& header_, std::ifstream& ifs, bool loadEntireDataSetHint_)
00078 {
00079         fileName = fileName_;
00080         header = header_;
00081 
00082         mappedData = 0;
00083         data = 0;
00084         isOpen = false;
00085 
00086 #ifdef _MSC_VER
00087         fileMapHandle = 0;
00088 #else
00089         fp = 0;
00090 #endif
00091         mapStart = 0;
00092         mapLen = 0;
00093         fileStream = &ifs;
00094         useMemoryMapping = false;
00095         loadEntireDataSetHint = loadEntireDataSetHint_;
00096 }

00116 /*
00117  * Open the DataSet for reading
00118  */
00119 bool DataSet::Open()
00120 {
00121         UpdateColumnByteOffsets();
00122 
00123         if (useMemoryMapping)
00124                 isOpen = OpenMM();
00125         else
00126         {
00127                 ReadDataSetUsingStream();
00128                 isOpen = true;
00129         }
00130         return isOpen;
00131 }
00132 
00133 /*
00134  * Open the file using memory-mapping
00135  */
00136 bool DataSet::OpenMM()
00137 {
00138 #ifdef _MSC_VER
00139         if (MapDataWin32(header.GetDataStartFilePos(), header.GetDataSize()) == false)
00140                 return false;
00141 #else
00142         // Open the file
00143         fp = fopen(fileName.c_str(), "r");
00144         if (fp == NULL)
00145         {
00146                 return false;
00147         }
00148 
00149         if (MapDataPosix(header.GetDataStartFilePos(), header.GetDataSize()) == false)
00150                 return false;
00151 #endif
00152 
00153         return true;
00154 }
00155 
00156 /*
00157  * Reads the DataSet data from the file into a memory buffer.
00158  */
00159 void DataSet::ReadDataSetUsingStream()
00160 {
00161         if(loadEntireDataSetHint == false)
00162                 return;
00163 
00164         mapLen = header.GetDataSize();
00165         mapStart = header.GetDataStartFilePos();
00166 
00167         data = new char[mapLen];
00168         fileStream->seekg(mapStart);
00169         fileStream->read(data, mapLen);
00170 }
00171 
00172 /*
00173  * Close the DataSet
00174  */
00175 void DataSet::Close()
00176 {
00177         if (useMemoryMapping)
00178                 UnmapFile();
00179         else
00180                 ClearStreamData();
00181 }

00183 #ifdef _MSC_VER
00184 
00185 std::string GetErrorMsg()
00186 {
00187         LPVOID lpMsgBuf;
00188         if (!FormatMessage( 
00189                         FORMAT_MESSAGE_ALLOCATE_BUFFER | 
00190                         FORMAT_MESSAGE_FROM_SYSTEM | 
00191                         FORMAT_MESSAGE_IGNORE_INSERTS,
00192                         NULL,
00193                         GetLastError(),
00194                         MAKELANGID(LANG_NEUTRAL, SUBLANG_DEFAULT), // Default language
00195                         (LPTSTR) &lpMsgBuf,
00196                         0,
00197                         NULL ))
00198         {
00199                 // Handle the error.
00200                 return "";
00201         }
00202 
00203         std::string message = (char*)lpMsgBuf;
00204 
00205         // Free the buffer.
00206         LocalFree( lpMsgBuf );
00207 
00208         return message;
00209 }
00210 
00211 /*
00212  * Map the data on Win32
00213  */
00214 bool DataSet::MapDataWin32(u_int32_t start, u_int32_t bytes)
00215 {
00216         mapStart = start;
00217 
00218         if (bytes > MaxViewSize)
00219         {
00220                 bytes = MaxViewSize;    // limit the amount of data mapped
00221         }
00222 
00223         SYSTEM_INFO sysinfo;
00224         GetSystemInfo (&sysinfo);
00225         u_int64_t qwFileOffset = u_int64_t(start);
00226         DWORD dwOffset = DWORD(qwFileOffset % sysinfo.dwAllocationGranularity);
00227         qwFileOffset = (qwFileOffset / sysinfo.dwAllocationGranularity) *
00228                                                                 sysinfo.dwAllocationGranularity;
00229         DWORD dwOffsetHigh = DWORD(qwFileOffset >> 32);
00230         DWORD dwOffsetLow  = DWORD(qwFileOffset & 0xFFFFFFFF);
00231         DWORD dwBytesToMap = bytes + dwOffset;
00232 
00233         if (mappedData != 0)
00234         {
00235                 UnmapViewOfFile (mappedData);
00236         }
00237         mappedData = MapViewOfFile(fileMapHandle, FILE_MAP_READ, dwOffsetHigh, dwOffsetLow, dwBytesToMap);
00238         if (mappedData == 0)
00239         {
00240                 std::string msg = GetErrorMsg();
00241                 data = 0;
00242                 fileMapHandle = NULL;
00243                 mapStart = 0;
00244                 return false;
00245         }
00246         mapLen = bytes;
00247         data = (char *)mappedData + dwOffset;
00248         return true;
00249 }
00250 
00251 #else
00252 
00253 /*
00254  * Map the data on Linux
00255  */
00256 bool DataSet::MapDataPosix(u_int32_t start, u_int32_t bytes)
00257 {
00258         mapStart = start;
00259         if (fp == NULL)
00260                 return false;
00261 
00262         u_int32_t page_start = PAGE_TRUNC(start);
00263         u_int32_t page_offset = start - page_start;
00264         mapLen = bytes + page_offset;
00265 
00266         // Get the file size
00267         struct stat st;
00268         if (stat(fileName.c_str(), &st) == 0)
00269         {
00270                 int fileLen = st.st_size;
00271                 if (fileLen < page_start + mapLen)
00272                         mapLen = fileLen - page_start;
00273         }
00274 
00275         // Map the file.
00276         mappedData = mmap(NULL, mapLen, PROT_READ, MAP_SHARED, fileno(fp), page_start);
00277         if (mappedData == MAP_FAILED)
00278         {
00279                 Close();
00280                 return false;
00281         }
00282         else
00283         {
00284                 data = ((char *)mappedData) + page_offset;
00285         }
00286         return true;
00287 }
00288 #endif
00289 
00290 /*
00291  * Close the memory-map
00292  */
00293 void DataSet::UnmapFile()
00294 {
00295 #ifdef _MSC_VER
00296 
00297         // Unmap the view
00298         if (mappedData != 0 )
00299         {
00300                 UnmapViewOfFile(mappedData);
00301                 mappedData = 0;
00302         }
00303         fileMapHandle = NULL;
00304         data = 0;
00305         mapStart = 0;
00306         mapLen = 0;
00307 
00308 #else
00309         if (fp != NULL)
00310         {
00311                 if (mappedData)
00312                 {
00313                         munmap(mappedData, mapLen);
00314                         mapLen = 0;
00315                         mappedData = 0;
00316                 }
00317                 fclose(fp);
00318                 fp = NULL;
00319         }
00320 #endif
00321 }
00322 
00323 /*
00324  * Delete the buffer
00325  */
00326 void DataSet::ClearStreamData()
00327 {
00328         delete[] data;
00329         data = 0;
00330         mapStart = 0;
00331         mapLen = 0;
00332 }

00334 /*
00335  * Check the row, column and expected column type
00336  */
00337 void DataSet::CheckRowColumnAndType(int32_t row, int32_t col, DataSetColumnTypes type)
00338 {
00339         if (isOpen == false)
00340         {
00341                 affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::DataSetNotOpenException e;
00342                 throw e;
00343         }
00344 
00345         if (col < 0 || col >= header.GetColumnCnt())
00346         {
00347                 affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::ColumnIndexOutOfBoundsException e;
00348                 throw e;
00349         }
00350 
00351         if (row < 0 || row >= header.GetRowCnt())
00352         {
00353                 affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::RowIndexOutOfBoundsException e;
00354                 throw e;
00355         }
00356 
00357         // Check if the data type is expected
00358 
00359         if (header.GetColumnInfo(col).GetColumnType() != type)
00360         {
00361                 affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::UnexpectedColumnTypeException e;
00362                 throw e;
00363         }
00364 }
00365 
00366 /*
00367  * Detemine the address of data given row and col.  Ensure all requested data is mapped
00368  */
00369 char* DataSet::FilePosition(int32_t rowStart, int32_t col, int32_t rowCount)
00370 {
00371         if (isOpen == false)
00372         {
00373                 affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::DataSetNotOpenException e;
00374                 throw e;
00375         }
00376 
00377         // Limit row count
00378         if (rowCount > header.GetRowCnt())
00379                 rowCount= header.GetRowCnt();
00380 
00381         if (useMemoryMapping == false && loadEntireDataSetHint == false)
00382         {
00383                 return LoadDataAndReturnFilePosition(rowStart, col, rowCount);
00384         }
00385 
00386         // Byte offset in data set + byte offset of data set in file
00387         u_int32_t startByte = BytesPerRow()*rowStart + columnByteOffsets[col] + header.GetDataStartFilePos();
00388 
00389 #ifdef _MSC_VER
00390 
00391         if (useMemoryMapping)
00392         {
00393                 // Byte offset in data set + byte offset of data set in file
00394                 u_int32_t endByte = BytesPerRow()*(rowStart+rowCount-1) + columnByteOffsets[col+1] + header.GetDataStartFilePos();      // as long as col is in bounds this is safe.
00395 
00396                 // Remap the file if necessary
00397                 if (startByte < mapStart || endByte > mapStart+mapLen)
00398                 {
00399                         if (startByte < mapStart)       // moving backwards through the data, attempt to find an optimum startByte.
00400                         {
00401                                 u_int32_t reverseStartByte = 0;
00402                                 if (endByte > MaxViewSize)
00403                                         reverseStartByte = endByte - MaxViewSize;
00404 
00405                                 // Don't go above the DataSet data
00406                                 if (reverseStartByte < header.GetDataStartFilePos())
00407                                         reverseStartByte = header.GetDataStartFilePos();
00408 
00409                                 if (MapDataWin32(reverseStartByte, header.GetDataStartFilePos() + header.GetDataSize() - reverseStartByte) == false)
00410                                 {
00411                                         affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::DataSetRemapException e;
00412                                         throw e;
00413                                 }
00414                         }
00415                         else    // forward
00416                         {
00417                                 if (MapDataWin32(startByte, header.GetDataStartFilePos() + header.GetDataSize() - startByte) == false)
00418                                 {
00419                                         affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::DataSetRemapException e;
00420                                         throw e;
00421                                 }
00422                         }
00423                 }
00424         }
00425 #endif
00426 
00427         char*   filePosition = data + (startByte-mapStart);
00428         return filePosition;
00429 }
00430 
00431 /*
00432  *
00433  */
00434 char* DataSet::LoadDataAndReturnFilePosition(int32_t rowStart, int32_t col, int32_t rowCount)
00435 {
00436         // Delete the previous data
00437         ClearStreamData();
00438 
00439         mapLen = BytesPerRow()*rowCount;
00440         mapStart = BytesPerRow()*rowStart + columnByteOffsets[col] + header.GetDataStartFilePos();
00441 
00442         data = new char[mapLen];
00443         fileStream->seekg(mapStart);
00444         fileStream->read(data, mapLen);
00445         return data;
00446 }
00447 
00448 /*
00449  * Update the column sizes
00450  */
00451 void DataSet::UpdateColumnByteOffsets()
00452 {
00453         columnByteOffsets.clear();
00454 
00455         int32_t accum = 0;
00456         int32_t cols = header.GetColumnCnt();
00457         for (int32_t col = 0; col < cols; ++col)
00458         {
00459                 columnByteOffsets.push_back(accum);
00460                 accum += header.GetColumnInfo(col).GetSize();
00461         }
00462         columnByteOffsets.push_back(accum);
00463 }
00464

00466 {
00467         // Get the data
00468         char* instr = FilePosition(row, col);
00469         value = FileInput::ReadUInt8(instr);
00470 }

00528 
00529 int32_t DataSet::ComputeEndRow(int32_t startRow, int32_t count)
00530 {
00531         int32_t rows = startRow + count;
00532         if (count == -1 || (rows > header.GetRowCnt()))
00533                 rows = header.GetRowCnt();
00534 
00535         return rows;
00536 }
00537 
00538 template<typename T> void DataSet::ClearAndSizeVector(std::vector<T>& values, u_int32_t size)
00539 {
00540         values.clear();
00541         values.resize(size);
00542 }
00543 
00544 template<typename T> void DataSet::GetDataT(int32_t col, int32_t startRow, int32_t count, T& values)
00545 {
00546         int32_t endRow = ComputeEndRow(startRow, count);
00547         ClearAndSizeVector(values, endRow-startRow);
00548 
00549         if (header.GetColumnCnt() > 1)
00550         {
00551                 for (int32_t row = startRow; row < endRow; ++row)
00552                 {
00553                         // Get the data
00554                         char* instr = FilePosition(row, col);
00555                         AssignValue(row-startRow, values, instr);
00556                 }
00557         }
00558         else
00559         {
00560                 char* instr = FilePosition(startRow, col, count);
00561                 int32_t recomputePositionRow = LastRowMapped();
00562 
00563                 for (int32_t row = startRow; row < endRow; ++row)
00564                 {
00565                         if (row > recomputePositionRow)
00566                         {
00567                                 instr = FilePosition(row, col, count-row);
00568                                 recomputePositionRow = LastRowMapped();
00569                         }
00570                         AssignValue(row-startRow, values, instr);
00571                 }
00572         }
00573 }

00665 template<typename T> int32_t DataSet::GetDataRawT(int32_t col, int32_t startRow, int32_t count, T* values)
00666 {
00667         int32_t endRow = ComputeEndRow(startRow, count);
00668 
00669         if (header.GetColumnCnt() > 1)
00670         {
00671                 for (int32_t row = startRow; row < endRow; ++row)
00672                 {
00673                         char* instr = FilePosition(row, col);
00674                         AssignValue(row-startRow, values, instr);
00675                 }
00676         }
00677         else // optimize
00678         {
00679                 char* instr = FilePosition(startRow, col, count);
00680                 int32_t recomputePositionRow = LastRowMapped();
00681 
00682                 for (int32_t row = startRow; row < endRow; ++row)
00683                 {
00684                         if (row > recomputePositionRow)
00685                         {
00686                                 instr = FilePosition(row, col, count-row);
00687                                 recomputePositionRow = LastRowMapped();
00688                         }
00689                         AssignValue(row-startRow, values, instr);
00690                 }
00691         }
00692         return endRow-startRow;
00693 }

00725 void DataSet::AssignValue(int32_t index, float* values, char*& instr)
00726 {
00727         values[index] = FileInput::ReadFloat(instr);
00728 }

00784 int32_t DataSet::LastRowMapped()
00785 {
00786         return (mapLen+(mapStart-header.GetDataStartFilePos()))/BytesPerRow() - 1;
00787 }
